title: Pixel 2 XL: Gesture Navigation broken after December update
content: With the most recent OTA system update (12/19) for my Pixel 2 XL, the gesture navigation in Pixel Launcher is broken. The problem presents itself as a persistent and prohibitive "pixel launcher keeps stopping" message. I am also using an app called "digilux" to use my fingerprint scanner as a secondary navigation input. I did try uninstalling it to alleviate the problem, but; like clearing PL's app cache and storage, it was to no avail.
